changeSet.author: elena
changeSet.comment: Create Animal table and test data
changeSet.sql:
CREATE TABLE `Animal` ( `id` BIGINT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `nickname` VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, `sex` CHAR NOT NULL, `type` BIGINT NOT NULL , `chip` VARCHAR(50) NULL , `weight` INTEGER NOT NULL , `birthday` TIMESTAMP NOT NULL , `breed` BIGINT NOT NULL , `color` VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL , `place_of_birth` VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL , `human` BIGINT NOT NULL , `TNVED_code` VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL , `color_ENG` VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL , PRIMARY KEY (`id`) );
INSERT INTO `Animal` (`nickname`,`sex`, `type`,`chip`,`breed`,`color`,`color_ENG`, `birthday`, `human`, `TNVED_code`, `place_of_birth`, `weight`) VALUES ('Собакен','m','1','643093300085088','1','черный','black','2020-12-11 19:22:00', 1, '123', 'Владимир', 4500); INSERT INTO `Animal` (`nickname`,`sex`, `type`,`chip`,`breed`,`color`,`color_ENG`, `birthday`, `human`, `TNVED_code`, `place_of_birth`, `weight`) VALUES ('Кошак','w','1','6430934223488','1','белый','white','2020-12-11 19:22:00', 1, '123', 'Владимир', 50000);
